title: Great deal on a last-minute one-bedroom apartment in Washington Square
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'This is an even better deal for September!!!', 'It is a totally renovated one-bedroom with dishwasher just steps to Coolidge Corner and Washington Square.', 'It was all gutted last year and features gleaming hardwood floors, nicely renovated kitchen with dishwasher and open layout, modern granite bathroom, and huge rooms.', 'Heat and hot water are included.', 'The T stop is right across the street.', 'ID: 302389799', 'Rent: $2,000 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cats Only', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', "Still looking for a 9/1 Brookline apartment that doesn't break the bank?", 'This is your opportunity.', 'Come see this well maintained garden level 1 bed/1 bath before it rents!', '- Located right on Beacon St.', '- Easy access to the C line.', '- Walkable to Coolidge Corner.', '- Laundry in the building.', 'FEATURES', 'Cat OK', 'Hardwood Floors', 'Heat Included', 'Laundry in Building', 'Near T', 'Parking availible', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
